zh.title: 华国锋任中共中央主席、中央军委主席
埃及总统萨达特遇刺身亡
美国电影《回到未来》上映
瑞士天文学家发现首颗系外行星
美国与朝鲜核问题谈判破裂
卡瓦诺大法官确认听证引发争议

en.title: Hua Guofeng succeeds Mao Zedong as Chairman of the Communist Party of China.
Pope John Paul II became the first Pope to visit the White House.
Egyptian President Anwar Sadat was assassinated in Cairo.
Fiji declared a republic after a military coup.
51 Pegasi b, the first extrasolar planet orbiting a sun-like star, was discovered.
The Dow Jones Industrial Average closed above 10,000 for the first time.
The Angolan government declared the end of the civil war.
Instagram was launched on the Apple App Store.
Nikki Haley resigned as United States Ambassador to the United Nations.
